channel.title: Need help
channel.description: I need help copying something from 1 website to mine... it should be easy for anyone who knows php (I only know html). Kinda hard to explain, so if someone will help me for a sec on it, add my msn - Gtech@gamerz-elite.com

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Gtech_Warriors Gtech Warriors
item.description:
@Gtech_Warriors wrote:

Well here ill just post on here… go to www.joox.net … and on there website they have a Bar and beside it it says Watch. Well everytime u put in a movie number or url from www.stage6.divx.com it adds it under “Recently added, needs confirmation” and people can go there and say if the movie is right or not and if so many people say its right, it automaticaly adds it to the Movies.

How would i put that on my site?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

N00b1:

php is server side it is executed before you even know it is there so you can only retrieve the html from that page (or any other non server side code) but if you are good you can add in the php if you know the page in side out but it is just worth starting from scratch and using there html

Unless you have access to the site via ftp or cp lol, thats why I said that you can’t steal it

Read full topic
